text: Alhaji Abdulsalam Sanyaolu is a Nigerian actor from Abeokuta, Ogun State. He mainly acts in Yoruba-language film in "Nollywood". ==Career== Alhaji Abdulsalam Sanyaolu began acting in 1953 at a church in Lagos. ==References== ==External links== *https://www.nigeriafilms.com/more/80-interviews/9635-my- only-regret-alhaji-abdulsalam-sanyaolu-a-k-a-charles-olumo-or-agbako *http://www.saharaweeklyng.com/im-not-pasumas-biological-father-charles-olumo- aka-agbako/ Category:Living people Category:Nigerian male film actors Category:20th-century Nigerian male actors Category:Yoruba male actors Category:Male actors in Yoruba cinema Category:Male actors from Abeokuta Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Charles Olumo
